attributes.action: Ensure that the British Library remains fully funded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The research and educational functions of the British Library are currently under threat. The Treasury is demanding a 7% cut in BL expenditure which will result in: a reduction in opening hours by one third; the introduction of charges for researchers; the closure of public exhibitions and schools learning programs; the termination of the national newspaper archive; and a reduction in the permanent collections of fifteen percent.

Further information:
British Library site:
http://www.bl.uk/spendingreview.html

http://news.independent.co.uk/uk/this_britain/article2192972.ece

http://arts.guardian.co.uk/art/news/story/0,,2002406,00.html

Email the British Library with your support at:
chief-executive@bl.uk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
